saveXMLToFile

public static boolean saveXMLToFile(oracle.ide.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String xml)
Save the XML String to the VIB config file. If the file does not exist it will be created. If it does exist is under source control, it will be checked out. No exceptions will be thrown, this method will log exceptions to the log if an error occurs.

Parameters:
context - context of folder containing the config file
xml - xml content to save.
Returns:
success indicator
See Also:
OsnUtils#saveXMLToFile()
